attributes.action: Look into the fairness of the e-petition system publicly on national television
attributes.additional_details:
As a former military man serving in Nuclear Weapons and having an honors degree in Ethical Hacking and Security System Design I feel it is my right as an Englishman to have my voice listened to not rejected by members of government.

The e-petition system I feel does not cater for the needs of the public.

Petitions are not accepted therefore hidden keeping the public from knowledge that is in their best interests.

It is a system that is in place to allow people to have their educated say in areas that matter to them for the safety of our family and  friends.

1000 characters does not allow a person with education to get their true feelings across to the public.

It is therefore asked that the government have a public televised debate with the public across the UK so the public can give their input into the e-petition system.
